title: Login
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-login

![Mandatory](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Mandatory-red.png) Renders the Login component, as shown in the media above.

`"vtex.login@2.x"`

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

optionsTitle.markdownDescription:
string

Text to entitle the login options.

emailAndPasswordTitle.markdownDescription:
string

Text to display the email-and-password option.

accessCodeTitle.markdownDescription:
string

Text to display the access-code option.

emailPlaceholder.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed as placeholder to the email input.

passwordPlaceholder.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed as placeholder to the password input.

accessCodePlaceholder.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed as placeholder to the access code input.

showPasswordVerificationIntoTooltip.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether a tooltip responsible for checking the password format should be shown (true) or not (false).

showIconProfile.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether the `hpa-profile` icon from [Store Icons](https://vtex.io/docs/components/all/vtex.store-icons/) should be displayed on the Login component (`true`) or not (`false`).

iconLabel.markdownDescription:
string

Text string to entitle the Login icon.

hideIconLabel.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether the text string defined for the Login icon should be hidden (true) or not (false).

providerPasswordButtonLabel.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed as the password button label.

hasIdentifierExtension.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether the identifier extension configurations should be enabled (`true`) or not (`false`). For more info on this, check out the [Advanced Configurations](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-login#advanced-configuration)

identifierPlaceholder.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed as placeholder to the extension input.

invalidIdentifierError.markdownDescription:
string

Error message for invalid user identifier.

mirrorTooltipToRight.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether the Login tooltip should open towards the right side of the screen (true) or not (false).

logInButtonBehavior.markdownDescription:
enum

Expected behavior of the Login component when clicked on. Possible values are: popover (opens a popover tab) and link (redirects user to the /login page).

accountOptionsButtonBehavior.markdownDescription:
enum

Expected behavior of the My account button when clicked on. Possible values are: popover (opens a popover tab) and link (redirects user to the /account page).

accountOptionLinks.markdownDescription:
[array]

Creates a custom link to replace the default one set for the accountOptionsButtonBehavior's link value (/account). Check out below the available props for the object.

label.markdownDescription:
string

Text label for the custom link.

termsAndConditions.markdownDescription:
string

Text to be displayed below the login options regarding terms&conditions.

hasGoogleOneTap.markdownDescription:
boolean

[BETA] Whether the [Google's One-tap sign-up and auto sign-in](https://developers.google.com/identity/one-tap/web/) solution should be enabled (true) or not (false).

googleOneTapAlignment.markdownDescription:
enum

[BETA] Defines pop-up alignment for the Google One-tap login. Possible values are Left and Right.

googleOneTapMarginTop.markdownDescription:
string

[BETA] Defines the pop-up top margin for the Google One-tap login. The values supported are the same supported by the CSS property top.

disabledEmailInputs.markdownDescription:
boolean

Whether user email editing should be allowed (true) or not (false).
